A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Devastatingly disappointing\, with a weak story\, moments that didn't feel right\, and\, most saddening\, a terrible continuation of Luke Skywalker's legacy. Lots of characters have no\, or very minimal\, development and some of the noteable deaths should not have happened so early\, within this new trilogy. 

There were a few funny moments\, that I definitely laughed at\, but many of those felt misplaced\, or didn't compliment the tone of the scene. I did enjoy most of the Kylo story\, as well as Snoke's\, but there were so many characters and ships that I just didn't care about.

The least Star Wars of all the movies\, and also my least favourite. After seeing The Last Jedi\, I genuinely value the prequels far more highly.
